I ordered 4 shoes, 2 arrived and I opt to sent it back. My refund took one month, I had to contact the customer service at least twice to receive my money back. As for the other 2, they never arrived!"}, {'url': 'https://www.zappos.com/product/review/7921765', 'content': "The little holes add a very nice touch. There is also 0% arch support and flexibility. So, don't expect any comfortable long-distance walking."}, {'url': 'https://nl.trustpilot.com/review/gaborstore.nl', 'content': 'Vreselijk aflatende rode Gabor schoenen.
